org.springframework.web.util

类 JavaScriptUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.util.JavaScriptUtils

  • public abstract class JavaScriptUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for JavaScript escaping. Escapes based on the JavaScript 1.5 recommendation.

    Reference: JavaScript Guide on Mozilla Developer Network.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.1.1
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller, Rob Harrop, Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String javaScriptEscape(java.lang.String input)
      Turn JavaScript special characters into escaped characters.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • javaScriptEscape

        public static java.lang.String javaScriptEscape(java.lang.String input)
        Turn JavaScript special characters into escaped characters.
        参数:
        input - the input string
        返回:
        the string with escaped characters
